page.title: 05GREAT WAKERINGS INDUSTRY
page.content: APART FROM AGRICULTURE THE LARGEST INDUSTRY IN THIS AREA IS BRICKMAKING. THIS HAS BEEN A MAJOR INDUSTRY IN THIS AREA FOR THE PAST ONE HUNDRED YEARS OR MORE. THE MAIN WORKS AND DISTRIBUTION PLANT FOR THE ONE COMPANY NOW OPERATING IS DOWN STAR LANE IN GREAT WAKERING. THE BRICKS USED TO BE MADE TO THE NORTH OF THE VILLAGE AND TRANSPORTED BY RIVER TO OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY BUT NOW THE BRICKS ARE TRANSPORTED BY ROAD. THE BRICKS THAT WE MAKE AROUND HERE ARE LONDON STOCK BRICKS AND THEY ARE YELLOW IN COLOUR BECAUSE OF THE AMOUNT OF SAND IN THE BRICK EARTH THAT IS EXCAVATED. THERE IS A SMALL INDUSTRIAL ESTATE DOWN STAR LANE AND THE MOST POPULAR FORM OF INDUSTRY ON THE ESTATE IS CAR REPAIR AND MAINTENANCE. THERE ARE ALSO PRINTERS AND ELECTRICAL AND ELECTRONIC COMPONENT MANUFACTURERS ON THE ESTATE.
